description: Linear Model trained with L1 prior as regularizer (aka the Lasso)

param.name: n_iter
param.description: Maximum number of iterations. Should be greater than or equal to 1.

param.name: tol
param.description: Stop the algorithm if w has converged.

param.name: alpha_1
param.description: Hyper-parameter : shape parameter for the Gamma distribution prior over the alpha parameter.

param.name: alpha_2
param.description: Hyper-parameter : inverse scale parameter (rate parameter) for the Gamma distribution prior over the alpha parameter.

param.name: lambda_1
param.description: Hyper-parameter : shape parameter for the Gamma distribution prior over the lambda parameter.

param.name: lambda_2
param.description: Hyper-parameter : inverse scale parameter (rate parameter) for the Gamma distribution prior over the lambda parameter.

param.name: lambda_init
param.description: Initial value for lambda (precision of the weights). If not set, lambda_init is 1.

param.name: compute_score
param.description: If True, compute the log marginal likelihood at each iteration of the optimization.

param.name: fit_intercept
param.description: Whether to calculate the intercept for this model. The intercept is not treated as a probabilistic parameter and thus has no associated variance. If set to False, no intercept will be used in calculations (i.e. data is expected to be centered).

param.name: normalize
param.description: This parameter is ignored when fit_intercept is set to False. If True, the regressors X will be normalized before regression by subtracting the mean and dividing by the l2-norm.

param.name: copy_X
param.description: If True, X will be copied; else, it may be overwritten.

param.name: verbose
param.description: Verbose mode when fitting the model.
